abstract: The gift is from Shelley and Donald Rubin, and Mr. Rubin said he had decided to step down as chief executive.
snippet: The gift is from Shelley and Donald Rubin, and Mr. Rubin said he had decided to step down as chief executive.
lead_paragraph: The Rubin Museum of Art, the only museum in the United States dedicated to arts of the Himalayas and India, announced that its founders, Shelley and Donald Rubin, had donated $25 million to help support operations, exhibitions and programs over the next five years. It also said that Mr. Rubin has decided to step down as chief executive in a plan to broaden the museum's leadership and fund-raising operations.

headline.main: Rubin Museum Will Get $25 Million and a New Chief Executive
